snippet.title: Cool Boarders 3 Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
Cool Boarders 3 Trailer 1998

Official Content From Sony Entertainment

Choose from 20 boarders and 23 authentic snowboards that have their own strengths and weaknesses. Go down any of the 5 mountains for a realistic ride. Not too light on your feet? Well, then just punch out your opponent with this all new move. Now there's something you don't get to do every day!
Platforms: Sony PlayStation

Sony PlayStation
, Sports,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Cool Boarders 3
